text: Miami Rhapsody is a 1995 American romantic comedy movie directed by first time director David Frankel and starring Antonio Banderas, Sarah Jessica Parker, Gil Bellows, Mia Farrow, Paul Mazursky, Kevin Pollak, Barbara Garrick, Naomi Campbell, Jeremy Piven and Kelly Bishop. It was distributed by Buena Vista Pictures Distribution through Hollywood Pictures. Miami Rhapsody was released on January 27, 1995. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1995 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Disney movies Category:Movies directed by David Frankel Category:Movies set in Miami
title: Miami Rhapsody
